entry.title: Windows API - Let's use the register to change our Environment!

link.title: Windows API - Let's use the register to change our Environment!

entry.summary: In this blog, we are going to have a look at some Windows API’s Windows Registry Functions that will help us to manipulate the data inside the Windows Registry and as we know that our Environment Variables reside inside Windows Registry, so it will also help us to modify the Environment Variables in our system. link.title: Windows API - Let's Play with the Windows Environment Variables!

entry.summary: In this blog, we are going to have a look at two functions that let us manipulate the Environment Variables of our Windows Machine.
